Title: Object: Las Tentaciones de Sn. Antiono
Series: Colección lithographica de cuadros del rey de España el señor Fernando VII
Series: Colección litografica de cuadros del Rey de España
Description: The Temptation of St Antony; outside a ruined building, with the saint praying in front of a crucifix placed on a skull, two temptresses standing behind him, a monkey-like creature playing a flute at right, other demonic and grotesque creatures at left; after David Teniers the Younger. c.1826-1832 Lithograph on chine collé
Producer name: Print made by: Léon Auguste Asselineau
Print made by: José de Madrazo (director)
Curator's comments: From 'Colección lithographica de cuadros del Rey de España...', see 1869,0410.1367 for comment. After the painting by Teniers in the Hermitage, St Petersburg.
Bibliographic references: IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (undescribed)
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
Acquisition name: Purchased from: A E Evans & Sons
